descriptor: Barry's parents go to greet Ra
Ra wonders why they make such remarks to her...
Barry comes too... because he said she had syphilis !
J is looking for a man to kiss him
Pb encourages C to meet the woman in person
M still talks about the plan to have children
It's time to make a toast !!
Ra decides to leave...but ends up singing a Copacabana song
M breaks up w Dr B
C can't wait to see the woman he's chatting with come in...
Janice is the woman in question !
R sacrifices himself to kiss J because he's a good friend... but his audition is passed !
